brief: Launch a automated system to analyze and launch dynamic online rummy tournament format Games24x7 users, with high chances of churn and reward them to come in.
raw_data: 20% decrease in MAU, rewards brings back 66% users

sections.problem_statement: Games24x7 is facing potential user churn in its online rummy tournaments. To address this, we need to develop an automated system that analyzes user behavior to identify those at high risk of churning. The system will then create and launch dynamic tournament formats tailored to these users, offering targeted rewards to encourage their continued engagement. This proactive approach aims to retain valuable users and maintain a healthy, active player base.

goals_and_success_metrics.success_metric: Decrease churn rate by 20% within 6 months of system launch
50% of identified at-risk users participate in at least one dynamic tournament within 30 days
Increase 90-day retention rate by 15% compared to pre-system baseline

user_stories.story: I want to receive personalized tournament invitations that match my skill level and playing habits, so I feel motivated to continue playing on the platform.
I want the system to automatically create and launch dynamic tournaments based on user data, so I can focus on higher-level strategy and user experience improvements.
I want to view detailed reports on the performance of dynamic tournaments and their impact on user retention, so I can refine our retention strategies.
I want access to real-time user behavior data and churn predictions, so I can validate and improve the system's analytical models.

constraints: Must comply with all relevant gambling regulations and laws
System must integrate seamlessly with existing Games24x7 platform
User data privacy and security must be maintained at all times
Dynamic tournaments must not negatively impact the experience of non-at-risk users
System must be scalable to handle potential increase in user base and tournament frequency

milestones.milestone: Develop user behavior analysis and churn prediction model
Implement dynamic tournament creation and launch functionality
Integrate reward system and personalized notifications
Conduct beta testing with select user group

anomalies: High user return rate with rewards
actionable_insights: Focus on high-churn risk users for targeted rewards
Analyze user behavior to identify churn predictors
Optimize reward structure to maximize user return rate
Regularly monitor and adjust tournament formats based on user engagement metrics

sections.hypothesis: Implementing an automated dynamic tournament system will increase user retention by 30% within 3 months
sections.rationale: Historical data shows that rewards bring back 66% of users. An automated system can consistently engage high-churn risk users with personalized tournaments, potentially improving this metric further.
sections.test: Implement the automated system for a subset of users and compare their retention rates with a control group over a 3-month period.

sections.hypothesis: Targeting users with a 70%+ churn risk for dynamic tournaments will result in a 40% decrease in churn rate for this segment
sections.rationale: Focusing on high-risk users aligns with the actionable insight to target high-churn risk users. The 66% return rate with rewards suggests that targeted engagement could significantly reduce churn.
sections.test: Identify users with high churn risk, enroll them in dynamic tournaments, and compare their churn rate to a similar high-risk group not enrolled in the program.

sections.hypothesis: Optimizing reward structure based on individual user behavior will increase the user return rate from 66% to 80%
sections.rationale: Personalizing rewards based on user behavior can make them more appealing and effective. This aligns with the insight to optimize reward structure and the high success rate of current rewards.
sections.test: Develop an AI model to personalize rewards, apply it to a test group, and compare the return rate to the control group receiving standard rewards.

sections.hypothesis: Implementing seasonal tournament themes will reduce the impact of seasonal fluctuations, stabilizing MAU levels throughout the year
sections.rationale: Seasonal fluctuations are identified as a causal factor for user activity changes. Themed tournaments could maintain interest during typically low-activity periods.
sections.test: Create seasonal tournament themes for traditionally low-activity months and measure the change in MAU compared to the same periods in previous years.
